deckTypes.name: Lord of the Mysteries - 22 Pathways
deckTypes.description: The 22 Beyonder pathways from Lord of the Mysteries, depicting you in each divine role

deckTypes.name: Traditional Rider-Waite Tarot
deckTypes.description: Classic tarot symbolism with historical accuracy

deckTypes.name: Japanese Shinto Tarot
deckTypes.description: Kami spirits and Japanese spiritual traditions

traditional.name: The Fool
traditional.meaning: New beginnings, taking a leap of faith, being carefree
traditional.prompt: A person standing at the edge of a cliff, one foot lifted as if about to step off into the unknown, sun shining behind them, carrying a small bundle, white dog at their feet, mountains in background, tarot card art style

lordOfMysteries.abilities: Grafting, Historical Void Projection, Miracle Invocation
lordOfMysteries.prompt: A mysterious figure in ancient robes standing in a dimensional void, reality bending around them, cosmic symbols floating, holding cards that show different possibilities, ethereal and otherworldly atmosphere

egyptian.prompt: Ancient Egyptian deity Ra with solar disk crown, golden rays emanating, hieroglyphics in background, desert landscape, falcon-headed figure in royal regalia

celtic.prompt: Celtic druid figure with sacred oak staff, standing in ancient stone circle, mist swirling, Celtic knotwork patterns, mystical forest background

shinto.prompt: Japanese goddess emerging from cave, radiant light, mirror and jewels, torii gate, cherry blossoms, traditional Japanese art style

cards.personalLore: FILL THIS: Your story for this card - what aspect of your life does this represent? What vocation, lesson, or role?

traditional.name: The Magician
traditional.prompt: A person standing at a table with the four tarot suits (wand, cup, sword, pentacle), one hand pointing up to sky and one down to earth, infinity symbol above head, red roses and white lilies, confident expression

lordOfMysteries.abilities: Knowledge Projection, Perfect Replication, Mystery Enhancement
lordOfMysteries.prompt: A scholar surrounded by floating ancient tomes and mystical symbols, reality itself being written and rewritten, geometric patterns forming and dissolving, intense study and mastery

egyptian.prompt: Ibis-headed deity Thoth holding ankh and was scepter, ancient scrolls floating, moon disk crown, hieroglyphic texts glowing with power

celtic.prompt: Druid wizard in flowing robes, crystal staff, ancient grimoire open before them, Celtic symbols glowing, mystical energy swirling

shinto.prompt: Scholarly figure in traditional Japanese robes, calligraphy brush and scrolls, plum blossoms, peaceful temple setting, aura of wisdom

cards.personalLore: FILL THIS: Your story for The Magician - what skills have you mastered? What powers do you wield?

traditional.name: The High Priestess
traditional.meaning: Intuition, higher powers, mystery, subconscious mind
traditional.prompt: A serene figure seated between two pillars (one black marked B, one white marked J), crescent moon crown, Torah scroll in lap, pomegranates on veil behind, calm waters

lordOfMysteries.abilities: Secret Keeping, Knowledge Theft, Mystic Revelation
lordOfMysteries.prompt: A mysterious hooded figure in library of infinite secrets, books whispering forbidden knowledge, reality veiled in shadows, glowing eyes seeing all hidden truths

egyptian.prompt: Egyptian goddess Isis with throne crown, wings spread protectively, ankh symbol, mystical spells visible in air, temple setting

celtic.prompt: Celtic goddess figure with sacred flame, triple spiral symbol, healing herbs, standing at holy well, ethereal presence

shinto.prompt: Graceful goddess dancing with mirror, sakura petals falling, soft dawn light, mystical and serene atmosphere

cards.personalLore: FILL THIS: Your High Priestess moment - what intuitive knowledge guides you? What mysteries do you hold?

traditional.name: The Empress
traditional.prompt: A regal figure seated on throne in lush garden, crown of twelve stars, Venus symbol on shield, wheat field, waterfall, pregnant with creative abundance

lordOfMysteries.abilities: Beauty Manipulation, Dream Weaving, Psychological Corruption
lordOfMysteries.prompt: An impossibly beautiful yet terrifying figure bathed in crimson moonlight, reality warping around them in beautiful nightmares, roses with thorns of madness

egyptian.prompt: Cow-horned goddess Hathor with solar disk, sistrum rattle, joyful expression, flowers and music notes, celebration atmosphere

celtic.prompt: Earth mother figure in flowing green robes, rivers flowing from hands, flowers blooming at feet, ancient sacred landscape

shinto.prompt: Figure surrounded by white foxes, rice fields golden in sunset, torii gates, abundant harvest, prosperity symbols

cards.personalLore: FILL THIS: Your creative abundance - what have you nurtured into being? What grows under your care?

traditional.name: The Emperor
traditional.prompt: A commanding figure on stone throne, crown and armor, holding ankh scepter, ram heads on throne, barren mountains behind, absolute authority

lordOfMysteries.abilities: Order Bestowal, Rule Enforcement, Parasitic Control
lordOfMysteries.prompt: A dark emperor in obsidian throne, crown of black flames, reality itself bowing to their laws, fortress of absolute order, commanding presence

egyptian.prompt: Falcon-headed deity Horus with double crown of Egypt, holding was scepter and ankh, Eye of Horus symbol prominent, regal pose

celtic.prompt: Celtic king with silver prosthetic arm, sword of light, standing before hill fort, warriors' respect, noble bearing

shinto.prompt: Imperial figure in traditional Japanese armor, sacred regalia, standing before Mount Fuji, divine authority, founding presence

cards.personalLore: FILL THIS: Your empire - what structures have you built? What do you rule over?

traditional.name: The Hierophant
traditional.meaning: Spiritual wisdom, religious beliefs, conformity, tradition
traditional.prompt: A religious figure seated between two pillars, triple crown, two crossed keys, two acolytes kneeling, blessing gesture, formal religious setting

lordOfMysteries.abilities: Weather Control, Ocean Dominion, Calamity Bringing
lordOfMysteries.prompt: A figure commanding tempestuous seas and lightning storms, hovering above raging waters, trident of power, absolute control over natural disasters

egyptian.prompt: Green-skinned deity Osiris with crook and flail, atef crown, throne in underworld, scales of judgment, eternal wisdom

celtic.prompt: Elder druid in white robes, golden sickle, standing in sacred grove, oak trees, teaching younger druids, ancient wisdom

shinto.prompt: Wise guide figure at crossroads shrine, lantern light, showing the way, traditional robes, protective presence

cards.personalLore: FILL THIS: Your teachings - what wisdom do you pass down? What traditions do you uphold?

traditional.name: The Lovers
traditional.prompt: Two figures standing together in garden of Eden, angel Raphael blessing from above, tree of knowledge with serpent, tree of life, sun shining, naked innocence

lordOfMysteries.abilities: War Declaration, Strategic Foresight, Provocation Mastery
lordOfMysteries.prompt: A crimson-clad priest of war standing on battlefield, armies clashing in background, strategic brilliance visible in their eyes, banners of conquest

egyptian.deity: Nut and Geb - Sky and Earth
egyptian.prompt: Goddess Nut arching over Earth god Geb, stars on her body, their separation creating world, cosmic love and separation

celtic.prompt: Two swan figures transforming into lovers, lakeside setting, Celtic love knot, magical transformation, romantic atmosphere

shinto.prompt: Divine couple on heavenly bridge stirring ocean with jeweled spear, islands forming, creating Japan together, harmonious creation

cards.personalLore: FILL THIS: Your partnerships - what choices have defined you? Who stands beside you?

traditional.name: The Chariot
traditional.prompt: A warrior standing in chariot pulled by two sphinxes (one black, one white), starry canopy, armor with moon symbols, city behind, victorious advance

lordOfMysteries.abilities: Probability Manipulation, Fate Weaving, Luck Stealing
lordOfMysteries.prompt: A figure surrounded by spinning wheels of fate and probability, stars aligning at their command, reality branching into favorable outcomes, cosmic dice rolling

egyptian.prompt: Falcon-headed war god Montu in war chariot, wielding weapons, solar disk with uraeus, charging into battle, unstoppable force

celtic.prompt: Celtic warrior in battle chariot, Gae Bolg spear, warp spasm transformation, charging into battle, legendary prowess

shinto.prompt: Divine warrior in samurai armor, bow and arrows, standing victorious, protective presence over warriors, honorable strength

cards.personalLore: FILL THIS: Your victories - what battles have you won? What drives you forward?

traditional.name: Strength
traditional.prompt: A gentle figure calmly closing or petting a lion's mouth, infinity symbol above head, flower crown, mountain background, inner strength and gentleness

lordOfMysteries.abilities: Purification, Divine Light, Restraint of Evil
lordOfMysteries.prompt: A radiant figure blazing with holy light, wings of pure flame, purifying darkness, divine restraint over chaos, eternal and magnificent

egyptian.prompt: Lioness-headed goddess Sekhmet with solar disk, both fierce warrior and healer, balancing destruction and protection, powerful presence

celtic.prompt: Warrior woman training heroes, Isle of Skye setting, wielding legendary spear, teaching discipline through strength, formidable yet wise

shinto.prompt: Powerful deity taming the eight-headed serpent Yamata no Orochi, storm and courage, wild strength becoming heroic, dramatic confrontation

cards.personalLore: FILL THIS: Your strength - what beasts have you tamed? What inner power sustains you?

traditional.name: The Hermit
traditional.meaning: Soul searching, introspection, being alone, inner guidance
traditional.prompt: An old wise figure standing alone on mountain peak, holding lantern with six-pointed star, staff in other hand, snow-covered mountains, seeking wisdom in solitude

lordOfMysteries.abilities: Perfect Calculation, Future Sight, Knowledge Accumulation
lordOfMysteries.prompt: A solitary figure with third eye blazing, surrounded by infinite calculations and prophecies, seeing all possible futures, isolated in omniscience

egyptian.prompt: Jackal-headed deity Anubis holding ankh, guiding souls through afterlife, torch illuminating path, protective solitude, ancient wisdom

celtic.prompt: Ancient bard in meditation, harp beside them, cauldron of wisdom, visions of past and future, solitary enlightenment

shinto.prompt: Contemplative deity in meditation, surrounded by scrolls of wisdom, peaceful shrine setting, deep thought and understanding

cards.personalLore: FILL THIS: Your solitude - what wisdom have you found alone? What light do you carry?

traditional.name: Wheel of Fortune
traditional.meaning: Good luck, karma, life cycles, destiny, turning point
traditional.prompt: A great wheel surrounded by clouds, sphinx on top, snake descending, Anubis ascending, four winged creatures in corners reading books, TARO letters, alchemical symbols

lordOfMysteries.abilities: Desire Amplification, Mutation Granting, Wish Twisting
lordOfMysteries.prompt: A vast tree-like being of desire and transformation, granting twisted wishes, reality mutating around them, beautiful corruption, endless hunger

egyptian.prompt: Scarab-headed deity Khepri rolling sun disk, representing eternal cycles of death and rebirth, transformation and renewal

celtic.prompt: Goddess at spinning wheel weaving fate, surrounded by stars and seasons, Celtic wheel of the year, cosmic cycles

shinto.prompt: Smiling deity Ebisu with fishing rod and sea bream, symbols of fortune flowing around, lucky opportunities manifesting

cards.personalLore: FILL THIS: Your turning points - what cycles have shaped you? Where has fate led you?

traditional.name: Justice
traditional.meaning: Justice, fairness, truth, cause and effect, law
traditional.prompt: A crowned figure seated on throne between two pillars, holding upright sword in right hand and balanced scales in left, purple cloak, impartial judgment

lordOfMysteries.abilities: Crime Detection, Punishment Execution, Law Enforcement
lordOfMysteries.prompt: A stern judge in divine court, scales of cosmic justice, sword of judgment, all crimes visible before them, absolute fairness and inevitable punishment

egyptian.prompt: Goddess Ma'at with ostrich feather of truth, scales weighing heart against feather, maintaining cosmic balance and order

celtic.prompt: Druidic judge holding scales and rod of office, ancient law texts, oak grove court, dispensing traditional justice

shinto.prompt: Graceful deity Benzaiten with biwa instrument, flowing water representing balance and harmony, wise judgment

cards.personalLore: FILL THIS: Your justice - what balance do you maintain? What truths do you uphold?

traditional.name: The Hanged Man
traditional.meaning: Pause, surrender, letting go, new perspective
traditional.prompt: A figure suspended upside down from living tree by one foot, other leg crossed, hands behind back, halo around head, serene expression, sacrifice and enlightenment

lordOfMysteries.abilities: Death Bringing, Peaceful Rest, Dream Walking
lordOfMysteries.prompt: A compassionate figure cloaked in eternal night, bringing peaceful death and rest, crimson moon above, gentle release from suffering

egyptian.prompt: Dwarf deity Bes in protective stance, fierce expression yet benevolent, sacrificing appearance for protection of others

celtic.prompt: Figure hanging from World Tree, sacrificing for knowledge, runes appearing, transformative wisdom through sacrifice

shinto.prompt: Princess deity walking through fire to prove purity, cherry blossoms falling, willing sacrifice for truth

cards.personalLore: FILL THIS: Your sacrifice - what have you surrendered? What perspective did you gain?

traditional.name: Death
traditional.prompt: A skeletal figure in black armor riding white horse, black flag with white rose, sun rising between two towers, figures of all classes before the horse, transformation

lordOfMysteries.abilities: Catastrophe Weaving, Disease Spreading, Unnatural Beauty
lordOfMysteries.prompt: An incomprehensibly beautiful yet terrifying figure, endings and new corrupt beginnings, weaving catastrophes like art, transformation through desire

egyptian.prompt: Jackal goddess Anput overseeing mummification and passage to afterlife, transformation through death, renewal

celtic.prompt: Triple goddess as crow on battlefield, death bringing transformation, fate weaving, war goddess of endings and beginnings

shinto.prompt: Queen of Yomi underworld, transformation from creator to death deity, passage between worlds, inevitable endings

cards.personalLore: FILL THIS: Your deaths - what versions of yourself have died? What transformed?

traditional.name: Temperance
traditional.prompt: An angel with wings, one foot on land and one in water, pouring liquid between two cups, triangle in square on chest, iris flowers, mountain with crown, alchemical mixing

lordOfMysteries.abilities: Life Granting, Harvest Blessing, Natural Balance
lordOfMysteries.prompt: A nurturing figure surrounded by abundant harvest and flowing life energy, perfect balance of nature, seasons bowing to their will

egyptian.prompt: Androgynous deity Hapi pouring water from vessels, representing Nile's balanced flooding, abundance and moderation

celtic.prompt: Sea deity managing boundaries between worlds, cloak of mist, maintaining balance between realms, flowing moderation

shinto.prompt: Central deity maintaining cosmic balance, perfect harmony of all things, centered and moderating force

cards.personalLore: FILL THIS: Your balance - what do you moderate? What flows through you?

traditional.name: The Devil
traditional.meaning: Shadow self, attachment, addiction, restriction, sexuality
traditional.prompt: A horned devil figure on pedestal, inverted pentagram on forehead, two chained naked figures (male and female) with horns and tails, chains loose enough to remove, darkness and temptation

lordOfMysteries.abilities: Theft Mastery, Chain Manipulation, Desire Liberation
lordOfMysteries.prompt: A bound deity breaking chains of reality itself, stealing concepts and possibilities, imprisoned yet free, paradoxical liberation

egyptian.prompt: Set with mysterious animal head, desert storms, necessary chaos and disruption, challenging order, raw power

celtic.prompt: Dark standing stone idol, shadows and chains, representing material bondage and dark temptations, ancient power

shinto.prompt: Horned oni figure with iron club, representing shadow self and temptation, wild chaos and restriction

cards.personalLore: FILL THIS: Your shadows - what chains have bound you? What temptations shape you?

traditional.name: The Tower
traditional.meaning: Sudden change, upheaval, chaos, revelation, awakening
traditional.prompt: A tall tower struck by lightning, crown blown off top, two figures falling from burning tower, grey clouds, sudden destruction and revelation

lordOfMysteries.abilities: Lightning Control, Storm Summoning, Destruction Bringing
lordOfMysteries.prompt: A storm lord commanding lightning and tempests, towers crumbling before divine fury, absolute upheaval and revelation through destruction

egyptian.prompt: Lioness goddess in full destructive fury, cities falling, necessary destruction before renewal, catastrophic revelation

celtic.prompt: Giant with destructive eye opening, towers falling, catastrophic power revealed, sudden upheaval

shinto.prompt: Thunder deity with drums, lightning striking, sudden awakening through destruction, divine upheaval

cards.personalLore: FILL THIS: Your tower moments - what sudden changes shook you? What was revealed in collapse?

traditional.name: The Star
traditional.prompt: A naked figure kneeling by water, pouring water from two jugs (one into water, one onto land), large yellow star above with seven smaller stars, bird in tree, hope and renewal

lordOfMysteries.abilities: Dream Creation, Reality Writing, Hope Manifestation
lordOfMysteries.prompt: A visionary creating new realities from pure imagination, stars of possibility shining above, dreams becoming real, infinite hope

egyptian.prompt: Goddess Sopdet as star Sirius, bringing hope of Nile flood and renewal, new beginnings, celestial promise

celtic.prompt: Goddess in silver wheel of stars, Caer Arianrhod constellation, cosmic hope and renewal, stellar beauty

shinto.prompt: Star deities Orihime and Hikoboshi, wish papers on bamboo, hopeful reunion, celestial love and renewal

cards.personalLore: FILL THIS: Your hope - what stars guide you? What renewal have you experienced?

traditional.name: The Moon
traditional.prompt: A full moon with face, two towers, path leading to mountains, dog and wolf howling, crayfish emerging from water, illusion and fear

lordOfMysteries.abilities: Nightmare Weaving, Fear Manipulation, Darkness Control
lordOfMysteries.prompt: A figure of pure darkness under crimson moon, nightmares made manifest, fear and illusion as weapons, unsleeping terror

egyptian.prompt: Falcon-headed moon god Khonsu with lunar disk and crescent, night's mysteries, time passage, protective yet mysterious

celtic.prompt: Witch goddess with cauldron under full moon, transformation magic, intuitive wisdom, lunar mysteries

shinto.prompt: Moon deity Tsukuyomi in night realm, mysterious and distant, balancing sister sun, lunar wisdom and fear

cards.personalLore: FILL THIS: Your illusions - what fears haunt you? What do you see by moonlight?

traditional.name: The Sun
traditional.prompt: A bright sun with face, naked child on white horse, sunflowers, red banner, wall behind, pure joy and success

lordOfMysteries.abilities: Perfect Observation, Mind Reading, Truth Seeing
lordOfMysteries.prompt: An all-seeing figure in brilliant clarity, every truth revealed under their gaze, perfect understanding, illuminating observation

egyptian.prompt: Sun god Ra at noon in solar barque, maximum power and glory, life-giving rays, victorious journey across sky

celtic.prompt: Multi-talented deity Lugh radiating light, master of all skills, victorious and glorious, shining triumph

shinto.prompt: Sun goddess Amaterasu at full glory, light illuminating all, joy and celebration, divine radiance

cards.personalLore: FILL THIS: Your glory - what successes illuminate you? What joy do you radiate?

traditional.name: Judgement
traditional.prompt: Angel Gabriel blowing trumpet with cross banner, dead rising from coffins, mountains and water, resurrection and calling to higher purpose

lordOfMysteries.abilities: Death Judgment, Undead Control, Resurrection
lordOfMysteries.prompt: A figure judging souls and granting resurrection, the dead rising at their call, ultimate judgment between rest and return

egyptian.prompt: Osiris presiding over Hall of Two Truths, weighing hearts against feather of Ma'at, judgment of souls, resurrection for worthy

celtic.prompt: Deity Donn calling souls to Tech Duinn, judgment of ancestors, gathering of the dead, cycle of rebirth

shinto.prompt: Judge deity Emma-O with mirror of karma, souls being judged for rebirth, truth revealed, karmic judgment

cards.personalLore: FILL THIS: Your judgment - what calls you higher? What has been resurrected in you?

traditional.name: The World
traditional.prompt: A naked figure dancing in wreath, holding two wands, four winged creatures in corners (angel, eagle, lion, bull), completion and fulfillment

lordOfMysteries.abilities: Knowledge Preservation, History Recording, Complete Understanding
lordOfMysteries.prompt: A figure at the center of all accumulated knowledge and history, complete understanding achieved, cycles completed, ultimate fulfillment

egyptian.prompt: Creator god Atum in complete form, all creation finished, wearing both crowns, ultimate wholeness and completion

celtic.prompt: Goddess of sovereignty offering cup of completion, united kingdom, all quests fulfilled, perfect wholeness

shinto.prompt: Central deity with all creation complete and balanced, cosmic dance finished, perfect fulfillment of all things

cards.personalLore: FILL THIS: Your completion - what cycles have you finished? What world have you created?

defaultSettings.promptSuffix: , highly detailed, cinematic lighting, tarot card art style, masterpiece quality
